question: Avascular necrosis can be a possible sequelae of fracture of all of the following bones, except-
exp: *Some of the common sites where Avascular necrosis occurs are: 1) Head of the femur 2) Proximal pole of scaphoid and 3) Body of the talus Ref: Maheshwari 6th/e p. 50
